name: Urban Huntr
overview:
Urban Hunt’r is a unique social photo challenge game. Play at home or on the go; there is no learning curve, simply snap a photo and send it to Urban Hunt’r. Urban Hunt’r is made up of weekly games. Each week there is a new game, and each day there is a photo challenge. Users earn points by submitting photos and having people vote on their photos.

Users can choose to play multiple times per day. Urban Hunt’r is made up of several different game levels. Users start out on level one and are given ten, fun, photo challenges they need to complete.

The more photos and votes users have, the more points they will earn. The more points they attain, the better the rewards they can get in the Urban Hunt’r market place.
